data_table.description: Medication Survey Form, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: MSRC1
variable.description: [Reception]. Did you bring all the medications you used in the past two weeks, or their containers? Q1 [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC2
variable.description: [Reception]. Is this because you forgot, because you have not taken any medications at all in the last two weeks, or because you could not bring your medications? Q2 [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]
variable.value: Forgot or was unable to bring medications

variable.name: MSRC3
variable.description: [Reception]. Could we follow up on this after the visit so that we can get the information from the (other) medication labels? Q3 [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC4A
variable.description: [Medication records]. Medication name and concentration. Q4a [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC4B
variable.description: [Medication records]. Medication code number. Q4b [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC4D
variable.description: [Medication records]. Did you take this medication in the past 24 hours? Q4d [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC24A
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: high blood pressure. Q24a [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC24F
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: blood thinning. Q24f [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC24B
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: high blood cholesterol. Q24b [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC24G
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: diabetes or high blood sugar. Q24g [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC24C
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: angina or chest pain. Q24c [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC24H
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: stroke Q24h [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC24D
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: control of heart rhythm. Q24d [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC24I
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: leg pain when walking. Q24i [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC24E
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: heart failure. Q24e [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC25
variable.description: [Interview]. During the past two weeks, did you take any aspirin, Alka-Seltzer, cold medicine or headache powder? Q25 [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC27
variable.description: [Interview]. For what purpose are you taking aspirin? Q27 [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]
variable.value: Participant mentioned avoiding heart attack or stroke
Participant did not mention avoiding heart attack or stroke

variable.name: MSRC28
variable.description: [Interview]. During the past two weeks, did you take any [other] medication for arthritis, fever, or muscle aches and pains, (or menstrual cramps)? Q28 [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC21
variable.description: [Medication records]. Total number of medications in bag. Q21 [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC22
variable.description: [Medication records]. Number of medications unable to transcribe. Q22 [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC26
variable.description: [Interview]. How many days during the last two weeks did you take aspirin, or a medication that contains aspirin? Q26 [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRCFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Medication Survey Form]

variable.name: MSRCCY
variable.description: Contact year [7]

variable.name: MSRC7A
variable.description: [Medication records]. Medication name and concentration. Q7a [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSRC12A
variable.description: [Medication records]. Medication name and concentration. Q12a [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Medication Survey Form, exam 3]
